title: Professor Pixel User Progress Schema
description: Defines the structure for tracking a user's progress, including experience points (XP), levels, and achievements.

userId.description: The unique identifier for the user.

completedLessons.description: A list of unique identifiers for completed lessons.

id.description: A unique identifier for the achievement, e.g., 'pong-champion'.

name.description: The display name of the achievement.

description.description: A description of how to earn the achievement.

dateEarned.description: The date and time the achievement was earned.
